reviews.text: Can't complain about the station itself. There's adequate seating and it's always clean and quiet. Merseyrail on the other hand are absolutely awful. The timings on trains going to the Ellesmere Port stations are terrible. Would be alright if the all the Chester trains stopped at Capenhurst but they only do every second one at around the same time as the train stops at the Port so we have two trains every half hour going to the Port but they're both at the same time.

Well maintained and sign posted station with plenty of parking but watch out, because it isn't staffed at weekends and the ticket machines don't appear to offer the full range of tickets. I ended up driving to Bidston where I knew I'd at least avoid paying more than I needed to.
This is My Hometown Station I Love it The only Downside is the Fact the Ticket Office is Closed on Saturdays Sunday I get But Saturday it Should be open
This station is generally well maintained. Historic building, with modern housing development in progress. See pictures.
